homepage.text: Help Lucas and Marie find the code word the doctor needs to help the patient. With this code word you receive a lovely gift ! Choose the image below that matches the activity and answer the questions to find the code word . Good luck!
homepage.qstn: WHAT IS THE CODE WORD WE ARE LOOKING FOR?

correctpage.message: You can continue when clicking on the arrow.

beepage.prompt: Welcome to the sperm game! Do you know what you can fish up here?

butterflypage.text: Here you can perform an operation yourself like a real doctor! Do you want to give it a try?

ladybugpage.prompt:
Welcome to the ultrasound! 
 On the door you can find a number. This is the number of ultrasounds we performed in 2022.

slugpage.prompt:
Welcome to the lab Demo! 
 Here you can see a lab person bringing the sperm cell into the egg cell with a very small needle.

chickpage.prompt:
Welcome to the auditorium! 
 Listen very well to what the doctor says.

planepage.text:
Welcome to the freezing demo! 
 What can you freeze here?
